actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until the close of June 30, 1977, the duties on calcined petroleum coke not commercially suitable for use as a fuel.

summary.text: Suspends until June 30, 1977, the duties under the United States Tariff Schedules on calcined petroleum coke not commercially suitable for use as a fuel.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until the close of June 30, 1977, the duties on calcined petroleum coke not commercially suitable for use as a fuel.
